title: Kawa
description: Known today as Kawa, ruins of this ancient Egyptian and Kushite settlement are located on the east bank of the Nile river, seven kilometers south of the modern Nile bridge at Dongola in Sudan.

properties.description: Central point of visible archaeological remains determined using Google Earth imagery. Site location determined follow description and photograph in Welsby 2013, page 3. Dates after Welsby 2013 passim.
properties.title: Imagery Location of Kawa
